name: Orb Of Time
description:
A few weeks ago, there was a giant war between two great nations, Trarhiel and Xochal.

In the process, Xochal broke the Orb of Time.

As a result, every living person in Trarhiel and Xochal turned old.

You, fellow traveller, are the only hope of bringing youth back to the world.

But remember, Time is not on your side. It is ending. You must collect the Time Loop so that you get never-ending time.

If it does not load, check out this alternate link: https://simmer.io/@AryanJumani/orb-of-time
